A frontend that fetches all data from backend APIs
A backend that connects to an external PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
A homepage displaying a list of forum posts
A search bar to enable users to search for posts by keywords
Category filtering functionality to browse posts by category
A post creation form allowing users to create new forum posts
A reply functionality enabling users to respond to existing posts
A user center page displaying personal information, own posts, and reply history
User authentication system to manage login and session states
Post detail pages showing full content and associated replies
UI styled with ghost white background and slate gray components
Repository configured with package.json supporting `npm run install:all` and `npm run dev`
API endpoints for fetching, creating, and managing posts and replies
Database schema supporting users, posts, replies, and categories
Responsive design compatible across desktop and mobile views
